product.description: Monstera Deliciosa, often called the Swiss Cheese Plant, is a popular tropical indoor plant known for its large, glossy green leaves with natural splits and holes. These unique leaf patterns help the plant withstand heavy rain and capture sunlight in its native rainforest habitat. Native to Central America, Monstera thrives indoors with bright, indirect light and moderate watering.
